Plot: Chance and happenstance collide and strangers, who would probably never notice or speak to each other, get stuck together on a locked subway car beneath NYC. All of them have a story that reaches far beyond what is apparent on the surface.
Title: Stuck
Writer: Michael Berry (screenplay), Riley Thomas (based on the musical play)
Actors: Giancarlo Esposito, Amy Madigan, Ashanti, Arden Cho
